com.adobe.cq.dialogconversion

Class DialogRewriteUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.dialogconversion.DialogRewriteUtils

  • public class DialogRewriteUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides helper methods to be used by dialog rewrite rules.

      • copyProperty

        public static Property copyProperty(Node source,
                    java.lang.String relPropertyPath,
                    Node destination,
                    java.lang.String name)
                             throws RepositoryException
        Copies a property from a source to a destination node.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        relPropertyPath - The relative path to the property to be copied
        destination - The destination node
        name - The name for the copy of the property
        Returns:
        The copied property or null if the source property doesn't exist
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
